my-portfolio.name: profile-title
my-portfolio.label: Your Portfolio Title
my-portfolio.description: What should your portfolio be called? Your name perhaps or do you use an alias?

my-portfolio.name: logo
my-portfolio.label: Logo (Optional)
my-portfolio.description: Do you want to display your logo as the Title instead of the title above?

my-portfolio.name: profile-picture
my-portfolio.label: About Page Image (Optional)
my-portfolio.description: Add an image of yourself to personalize your portfolio!

my-portfolio.name: details-title
my-portfolio.label: Details Title (Optional)
my-portfolio.description: Include a title for your about description.
my-portfolio.value: Hi my name is Jane and this is my portfolio.

my-portfolio.name: details
my-portfolio.label: details
my-portfolio.value:
I am a digital designer and part time developer. I studied at the Global School of Design in London and have traveled the world working at many interesting companies. My passion for design has allowed me to work on some pretty awesome projects. Please take a look at the projects below and feel free to email me at jane.doe@anon.com.
I am currently available for jobs.

project-template.name: link
project-template.label: Link Your Project
project-template.description: Want to link to your project? Add the url below

project-template.name: description
project-template.label: Project Description
project-template.description: What is your project? When, where, why and how!

project-template.name: cover-image
project-template.label: cover-image
project-template.description: This will be the focus point for the project.

1.title: The Skullz
1.description:
Godard single-origin coffee twee before they sold out, distillery whatever dolore narwhal ex squid proident art party. Heirloom sint church-key, direct trade lumbersexual McSweeney's Odd Future readymade. Chambray accusamus art party, put a bird on it adipisicing bitters labore meh pork belly aute.

Helvetica cold-pressed dolor, 3 wolf moon heirloom vegan consequat eiusmod velit umami scenester retro hashtag anim Brooklyn. Delectus Thundercats vinyl, Blue Bottle organic street art you probably haven't heard of them reprehenderit. Cardigan ugh leggings YOLO elit mumblecore. Hashtag street art four dollar toast meditation plaid quis.
